thread.title: Sports Authority Field at Mile High Here are the results
thread.title_full: Sports Authority Field at Mile High Map Game: Here are the results - The Denver Post

author: Joe Murphy
title: Sports Authority Field at Mile High Here are the results
text:
Every other Sunday or so a few dozen dudes are paid quite a bit of money to throw a ball around at Sports Authority Field at Mile High in Denver. Thousands come to watch. With maps and roads it's easy to know how to get to the stadium, but without all those things would you know where the field was? Almost four out of ten of you did.
This week we asked readers to place the Denver Broncos home field on a map of Denver , and 39.6% were able to do so. That's pretty good. Not as good as the 42.1% who could locate Coors Field , but let the Rockies have this one okay?
Here are the game results, in map-form:
